[From the unofficial Quest Wiki](https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/Publishing-Quest-games-%28inc.-size-limitations%29):

>  Host your Quest game on your own web server (this is not trivial, is not well-supported and may require spending money, so not to be undertaken lightly)

On the other hand, hosting just the .quest file for people to download and play offline is possible on any website hosting service that allows for arbitrary uploads.

From the unofficial Quest Wiki:

Host your Quest game on your own web server (this is not trivial, is not well-supported and may require spending money, so not to be undertaken lightly)
